description: Celtic are braced for bids for Carl Starfelt as interest mounts in the Swedish defender, Brendan Rodgers expects exits, plus more.
title: Scottish gossip: Carl Starfelt, Brendan Rodgers, Graeme Souness, Danilo, Barry Robson
title_page: Scottish gossip: Carl Starfelt, Brendan Rodgers, Graeme Souness, Danilo, Barry Robson - BBC Sport
maintext:
Celtic are braced for bids for Carl Starfelt as interest mounts in the Swedish defender, who has two years left on his contract. (Scottish Sun), external
Scottish football could be set to see World Cup-style levels of added time in the new season as officials clamp down on time wasting. (Scottish Sun), external
Manager Brendan Rodgers expects players to leave Celtic before the transfer window shuts if they "don't fit into what I'm doing". (Daily Record), external
Barry Robson expects more incomings at Aberdeen as he prepares for two games a week until Christmas at least. (Press & Journal), external
St Johnstone have handed a trial to combative Albanian midfielder Ernaldo Krasniqi following his summer release from English Championship club Huddersfield Town. (The Herald), external
